title: Meta 2.1.3 – Music Tag Editor, Audio Metadata
content: Meta helps you manage your ever-growing digital music collection.   With Meta you can easily edit information such as a song’s artist, title, album, album cover, etc. It supports editing of most audio formats such as mp3, mp4, m4a, flac, ogg, oga, spx, wav, aiff… and a variety of metadata formats including ID3v1, ID3v2.3, ID3v2.4, […]

title: StarUML 5.0.1 – A sophisticated software modeler
content: StarUML is compatible with UML 2.x standard, and supports in total 11 kinds of UML diagrams: class, object, use-case, component, deployment, composite structure, sequence, communication, statechart, activity, and profile diagrams.
